title: Rugby-Super Rugby fixtures for 2018 season
text: February 14, 2018 / 8:02 AM / a day ago Rugby-Super Rugby fixtures for 2018 season Reuters Staff 8 Min Read WELLINGTON, Feb 14 (Reuters) - Super 15 fixtures for 2018 (kickoff times GMT): Week One (South Africa only) Feb 17 Stormers v Jaguares, Cape Town (1305) Lions v Sharks, Johannesburg (1515) Bye: Bulls Week Two Feb 23 Otago Highlanders v Auckland Blues, Dunedin (0635) Melbourne Rebels v Queensland Reds, Melbourne (0845) Feb 24 Sunwolves v ACT Brumbies, Tokyo (0415) Canterbury Crusaders v Waikato Chiefs, Christchurch(0635) NSW Waratahs v Stormers, Sydney (0845) Lions v Jaguares, Johannesburg (1305) Bulls v Hurricanes, Pretoria (1515) Bye: Sharks Week Three March 2 Auckland Blues v Waikato Chiefs, Auckland (0635) Queensland Reds v ACT Brumbies, Brisbane (0900) March 3
